K10D0215_H0216:320b-1: r'a dza de sha n'a ma mah'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10D0215_H0216:320b-3: rgyal po la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10D0215_H0216:320b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0215_H0216:320b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0215_H0216:320b-7: bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po w'a ra n'a si na 'khor rnams la tshos ston pa na /
K10D0215_H0216:320b-8: bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed 'dul ba'i dus
K10D0215_H0216:320b-9: la bab par gzigs nas 'khor dang bcas pa bad
K10D0215_H0216:320b-10: sa la'i yul du gshegs pa dang /
K10D0215_H0216:320b-11: bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed grong khyer chen
K10D0215_H0216:320b-12: po gser can zhes bya ba gzhom pa'i phyir dmag
K10D0215_H0216:321a-0: bzhi dang chas pa dang phrad pas rgyal @321a *//
K10D0215_H0216:321a-2: 'di 'dra ba'i bkra mi shis pa dang phrad pas
K10D0215_H0216:321a-3: bsad par rigs so zhes nas mda' ste'u kha nya
K10D0215_H0216:321a-6: de nas mda' de nam mkha' la 'khor zhing 'di skad ces grag go /
K10D0215_H0216:321a-7: zhe sdang gis ni sdug bsngal bskyed //
K10D0215_H0216:321a-9: phyi mar dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung //
K10D0215_H0216:321a-10: des na zhe sdang 'thab rtsod spang //
K10D0215_H0216:321a-11: zhes bya ba'i tshig de rgyal po 'char byed kyis thos par gyur pa dang /
K10D0215_H0216:321a-12: bcom ldan 'das la mos par gyur te phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10D0215_H0216:321a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0215_H0216:321a-15: 'thab rtsod ni 'dir sha thang la phyi mar ngan song du skye na /
K10D0215_H0216:321a-20: bdag gis gang dang 'thabs kyang pham ma myong ste
K10D0215_H0216:321a-21: rgyal bas bdag ni dmag dang 'thab pa la mos
K10D0215_H0216:321a-22: pa lags so // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0215_H0216:321a-24: dgra 'di ni dgra chung ngu yin te /
K10D0215_H0216:321a-26: 'di ma yin pa'i dgra chen po shar gnyer ba zhig yod do //
K10D0215_H0216:321a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0215_H0216:321b-0: dgra chen po nyon mongs pa bdag tu @321b tu 'dzin pa zhes bya ba zhig yod do //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-2: dgra de ji lta bu lags bshad du gsol /
K10D0215_H0216:321b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0215_H0216:321b-4: rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dgra chen po //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-5: 'di ni rgyu bzhin dngos po med bzhin du //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-6: thog ma med nas bdag la gnas nas ni //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-7: bdag gi chos sku yid bzhin rin chen de //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-8: gzod ma'i mu nas dgra yis brkus nas su //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-9: mtshan ma'i tshang tshing gseb tu sbas nas bdag /
K10D0215_H0216:321b-11: 'jig rten dgras ni bsad nas nor 'phrog tsam //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-12: de la bzod byas bsod nams tshogs kyang rdzogs //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-13: dgra 'di zhi bde thar pa'i srog kyang gcod //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-14: de bsten bsod nams 'khor bar 'dam du 'ching //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-16: dgra chen po de dang ji ltar 'thab par bgyi //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0215_H0216:321b-18: rnam rtog dgra la rgol ba'i shom ra yang //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-19: dad pas sbyin dang tshul khrims mkhar brtsigs te //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-20: dge ba'i dpung byas bzod pa'i go gyon la //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-21: brtson 'grus lcag thogs bsam gtan gzhu brdungs te //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-22: bdag med stong pa'i mda' yis bdag 'dzin bsad //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-23: rgyal pos gsol pa; bdag med pa zhes pa de bshad du gsol /
K10D0215_H0216:321b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0215_H0216:321b-25: gang zag bdag med rgyal po mnyan par gyis //
K10D0215_H0216:321b-26: gang zag lnga phung rgyun yin ci phyir na //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-0: @322a *// rgyu ni las dang nyon mongs pas gang nas //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-1: 'bras bu phung por zag ste de yi bdag /
K10D0215_H0216:322a-2: bdag ni sems can so so'i lus 'di la //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-3: nga dang bdag tu bzung nas chags gyur te //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-4: bdag ni na dang shi bkres grang gis dogs //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-5: bstod na dga' zhing smad na mi dga' ste //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-6: de la dmigs nas mu stegs lnga rnams 'jug /
K10D0215_H0216:322a-7: nga 'am bdag de yod pa ma yin te //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-8: phung po 'di la brtags nas 'khrul pa yin //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-9: ming ni bdag ma yin te btags pa tsam //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-10: lus ni bdag ma yin te sha rus rnams //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-11: 'byung chen 'dus pa phyi rol rtsig pa 'dra //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-12: sems kyang bdag ma yin te dngos po med //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-13: chos la bdag med rgyal po mnyan par gyis //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-14: chos ni gzugs sogs dngos po thams cad yin //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-15: byed pa med la mtshan nyid 'dzin phyir ro //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-16: de dag log rtog mtshan mar bcas pa dang //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-17: lta mi mthun pa yin te de med do //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-18: ci phyir zhe na phyi nang chos 'di la //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-19: dngos 'di spangs nas stong nyid mi btsal gyi //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-20: snang ba nyid na stong pa nyid yin phyir //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-21: gzhig bcom mi rtag tsam la stong ming gdags //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-22: snang la rang bzhin med par cis mngon na //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-23: yod med dbus dang gsum du mi gnas te //
K10D0215_H0216:322a-24: yod par grags pa 'khor ba mya ngan 'das //
K10D0215_H0216:322b-0: 'khor ba'i rang bzhin yul sems rnam gnyis @322b te; ;yul 'di dngos po med par 'di ltar brtag /
K10D0215_H0216:322b-1: rang snang rdul bshig rdul yang chas gzhigs med //
K10D0215_H0216:322b-2: dngos snang thams cad sems yin rmi lam bzhin //
K10D0215_H0216:322b-3: sems kyang kha dog dbyibs sogs rnams dang bral //
K10D0215_H0216:322b-4: des na 'khor ba stong zhing bdag med do //
K10D0215_H0216:322b-5: 'khor ba med pas mya ngan 'das pa'ang med //
K10D0215_H0216:322b-6: yod pa ma grub pas na med pa'ang med //
K10D0215_H0216:322b-7: mtha' gnyis med phyir dbus kyang med pa yin //
K10D0215_H0216:322b-8: de ltar rgyal pos bdag med sgom byas na //
K10D0215_H0216:322b-9: bdag 'dzin 'khor ba rtsad nas chod par 'gyur //
K10D0215_H0216:322b-11: snga gong yan chad dgra ma yin pa la dgrar bzung ste /
K10D0215_H0216:322b-12: bdag zhe sdang gis mnar bar gyur to //
K10D0215_H0216:322b-13: da ni bdag gis yang dag pa'i dgra ngo shes
K10D0215_H0216:322b-14: pas dgra de dang 'thab pa'i phyir bdag med pa
K10D0215_H0216:322b-15: la mos par gyur lags so //
K10D0215_H0216:322b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0215_H0216:322b-19: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dgra pham par byas so //
K10D0215_H0216:322b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0215_H0216:322b-21: bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la sogs pa yi rangs te /
K10D0215_H0216:322b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0215_H0216:322b-23: bdas la'i rgyal po 'char byed la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0215_H0216:322b-24: rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'a na sh'i la dang /
